sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select
t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_TYPE as transType, t.CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, ifnull(b.TRANS_TYPE_NAME,'-') as transTypeName, t.CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT as customerAccount, t.TAX_FLAG as taxFlag, t.AMT_CNY as amt, t.TAX_RATE as taxRate, t.TAX_AMT_CNY as taxAmt, t.IS_REVERSE as isReverse, t.BANK_CODE as bankCode, t.REMARK as remark, t.ORG_CURR_CODE as orgCurrCode, t.ORG_ACC_NO as orgAccNo, t.AMT_CCY as amtCcy, t.REVERSE_TRANS_ID as reverseTransId, t.INCOME_CNY as income, t.SHORT_AND_OVER as shortAndOver, t.BALANCE as balance, t.INSTCODE as instCode, t.INSTNAME as instName, t.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, t.ORG_Trans_Type as orgTransType, t.ORG_Trans_SUB_Type as orgTransSubType, t.REVERSE_TRANS_DATE as reverseTransDate, t.TRANS_BUS_ID as transBusId, t.Trans_Curr as transCurr, t.TAX_AMT_CCY as taxAmtCcy, t.INCOME_CCY as incomeCcy, t.Surtax1_AMT_CNY as surtax1, t.Surtax2_AMT_CNY as surtax2, t.Surtax3_AMT_CNY as surtax3, t.Surtax4_AMT_CNY as surtax4, t.Trans_FaPiao_Flag as transFapiaoFlag, t.FaPiao_Date as fapiaoDate, t.FaPiao_Type as fapiaoType, t.Trans_Flag as transFlag, t.VAT_Rate_Code as vatRateCode, c.customer_cname as customerName, c.customer_taxno as customerTaxno, c.customer_address as customerAddress, c.customer_phone as customerTel, c.taxpayer_type as customerTaxPayerType, c.fapiao_type as customerFaPiaoType, c.customer_type as customerType, t.CHERNUM as cherNum, t.REPNUM as repNum, t.TTMPRCNO as ttmpRcno, t.FEETYP as feeTyp, t.BILLFREQ as billFreq, t.POLYEAR as polYear, t.HISSDTE as hissDte, t.DSOURCE as dsouRce, t.CHANNEL as chanNel, t.PREMTERM as premTerm, t.OCCDATE as occDate, t.INSTFROM as instFrom, t.INSTTO as instTo from (SELECT * FROM VMS_TRANS_INFO t where 1 = 1 and FaPiao_Type in ('0','1')
t.Instcode in
#auth_inst_ids[]#
t.CHERNUM like '%$transInfo.cherNum$%'
t.TRANS_BUS_ID like '%$transInfo.transBusId$%'
t.TTMPRCNO like '%$transInfo.ttmpRcno$%'
t.FEETYP = #transInfo.feeTyp#
t.BILLFREQ = #transInfo.billFreq#
str_to_date(t.Trans_Date,'%y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#transInfo.billBeginDate#,'%y-%m-%d')
str_to_date(t.Trans_Date,'%y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#transInfo.billEndDate#,'%y-%m-%d')
str_to_date(to_char(t.HISSDTE,'%y-%m-%d'),'%y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#transInfo.hissBeginDte#,'%y-%m-%d')
str_to_date(to_char(t.HISSDTE,'%y-%m-%d'),'%y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#transInfo.hissEndDte#,'%y-%m-%d')
t.DSOURCE = #transInfo.dsouRce#
t.CHANNEL = #transInfo.chanNel#
and REVERSE_TRANS_ID is null and DATASTATUS in ('1', '2', '3') and IS_REVERSE = 'N' and Trans_FaPiao_Flag in ('A', 'M') and Trans_Flag = '2'
ORDER BY t.CHERNUM,t.CUSTOMER_ID,t.POLYEAR,t.PREMTERM )t left join VMS_TRANS_TYPE b on t.TRANS_TYPE = b.TRANS_TYPE_ID left join (select * from VMS_CUSTOMER_INFO c where Customer_Fapiao_Flag in ('A','M') ) c on t.CUSTOMER_ID = c.customer_id where 1 = 1 and t.DATASTATUS='1'

select * from ( select (@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) as rowindex, t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_TYPE as transType, t.CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, ifnull(b.TRANS_TYPE_NAME,'-') as transTypeName, t.CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT as customerAccount, t.TAX_FLAG as taxFlag, t.AMT_CNY as amt, t.TAX_RATE as taxRate, t.TAX_AMT_CNY as taxAmt, t.IS_REVERSE as isReverse, t.BANK_CODE as bankCode, t.REMARK as remark, t.ORG_CURR_CODE as orgCurrCode, t.ORG_ACC_NO as orgAccNo, t.AMT_CCY as amtCcy, t.REVERSE_TRANS_ID as reverseTransId, t.INCOME_CNY as income, t.SHORT_AND_OVER as shortAndOver, t.BALANCE as balance, t.INSTCODE as instCode, t.INSTNAME as instName, t.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, t.ORG_Trans_Type as orgTransType, t.ORG_Trans_SUB_Type as orgTransSubType, t.REVERSE_TRANS_DATE as reverseTransDate, t.TRANS_BUS_ID as transBusId, t.Trans_Curr as transCurr, t.TAX_AMT_CCY as taxAmtCcy, t.INCOME_CCY as incomeCcy, t.Surtax1_AMT_CNY as surtax1, t.Surtax2_AMT_CNY as surtax2, t.Surtax3_AMT_CNY as surtax3, t.Surtax4_AMT_CNY as surtax4, t.Trans_FaPiao_Flag as transFapiaoFlag, t.FaPiao_Date as fapiaoDate, t.FaPiao_Type as fapiaoType, t.Trans_Flag as transFlag, t.VAT_Rate_Code as vatRateCode, c.customer_cname as customerName, c.customer_taxno as customerTaxno, c.customer_address as customerAddress, c.customer_phone as customerTel, c.taxpayer_type as customerTaxPayerType, c.fapiao_type as customerFaPiaoType, c.customer_type as customerType, t.CHERNUM as cherNum, t.REPNUM as repNum, t.TTMPRCNO as ttmpRcno, t.FEETYP as feeTyp, t.BILLFREQ as billFreq, t.POLYEAR as polYear, t.HISSDTE as hissDte, t.DSOURCE as dsouRce, t.CHANNEL as chanNel, t.PREMTERM as premTerm, t.OCCDATE as occDate, t.INSTFROM as instFrom, t.INSTTO as instTo from (SELECT * FROM VMS_TRANS_INFO t where 1 = 1 and FaPiao_Type = '2'
t.Instcode in
#auth_inst_ids[]#
t.CHERNUM like '%$transInfo.cherNum$%'
t.TRANS_BUS_ID like '%$transInfo.transBusId$%'
t.TTMPRCNO like '%$transInfo.ttmpRcno$%'
t.FEETYP = #transInfo.feeTyp#
t.BILLFREQ = #transInfo.billFreq#
str_to_date(t.Trans_Date,'%y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#transInfo.billBeginDate#,'%y-%m-%d')
str_to_date(t.Trans_Date,'%y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#transInfo.billEndDate#,'%y-%m-%d')
str_to_date(to_char(t.HISSDTE,'%y-%m-%d'),'%y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#transInfo.hissBeginDte#,'%y-%m-%d')
str_to_date(to_char(t.HISSDTE,'%y-%m-%d'),'%y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#transInfo.hissEndDte#,'%y-%m-%d')
t.DSOURCE = #transInfo.dsouRce#
t.CHANNEL = #transInfo.chanNel#
and REVERSE_TRANS_ID is null and DATASTATUS in ('1', '2', '3') and IS_REVERSE = 'N' and Trans_FaPiao_Flag in ('A', 'M') and Trans_Flag = '2'
ORDER BY t.CHERNUM,t.CUSTOMER_ID,t.POLYEAR,t.PREMTERM )t left join VMS_TRANS_TYPE b on t.TRANS_TYPE = b.TRANS_TYPE_ID left join (select * from VMS_CUSTOMER_INFO c where Customer_Fapiao_Flag in ('A','M') ) c on t.CUSTOMER_ID = c.customer_id where 1 = 1 and t.DATASTATUS='1'

select * from ( select rownum as rowindex, t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_TYPE as transType, t.CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, ifnull(b.TRANS_TYPE_NAME,'-') as transTypeName, t.CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT as customerAccount, t.TAX_FLAG as taxFlag, t.AMT_CNY as amt, t.TAX_RATE as taxRate, t.TAX_AMT_CNY as taxAmt, t.IS_REVERSE as isReverse, t.BANK_CODE as bankCode, t.REMARK as remark, t.ORG_CURR_CODE as orgCurrCode, t.ORG_ACC_NO as orgAccNo, t.AMT_CCY as amtCcy, t.REVERSE_TRANS_ID as reverseTransId, t.INCOME_CNY as income, t.SHORT_AND_OVER as shortAndOver, t.BALANCE as balance, t.INSTCODE as instCode, t.INSTNAME as instName, t.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, t.ORG_Trans_Type as orgTransType, t.ORG_Trans_SUB_Type as orgTransSubType, t.REVERSE_TRANS_DATE as reverseTransDate, t.TRANS_BUS_ID as transBusId, t.Trans_Curr as transCurr, t.TAX_AMT_CCY as taxAmtCcy, t.INCOME_CCY as incomeCcy, t.Surtax1_AMT_CNY as surtax1, t.Surtax2_AMT_CNY as surtax2, t.Surtax3_AMT_CNY as surtax3, t.Surtax4_AMT_CNY as surtax4, t.Trans_FaPiao_Flag as transFapiaoFlag, t.FaPiao_Date as fapiaoDate, t.FaPiao_Type as fapiaoType, t.Trans_Flag as transFlag, t.VAT_Rate_Code as vatRateCode, c.customer_cname as customerName, c.customer_taxno as customerTaxno, c.customer_address as customerAddress, c.customer_phone as customerTel, c.taxpayer_type as customerTaxPayerType, c.fapiao_type as customerFaPiaoType, t.CHERNUM as cherNum, t.REPNUM as repNum, t.TTMPRCNO as ttmpRcno, t.FEETYP as feeTyp, t.BILLFREQ as billFreq, t.POLYEAR as polYear, t.HISSDTE as hissDte, t.DSOURCE as dsouRce, t.CHANNEL as chanNel, t.PREMTERM as premTerm, t.OCCDATE as occDate, t.INSTFROM as instFrom, t.INSTTO as instTo, vp.vpt_product_name as proDuctName from (SELECT * FROM VMS_TRANS_INFO t where 1 = 1
t.Instcode in
#auth_inst_ids[]#
)t left join VMS_TRANS_TYPE b on t.TRANS_TYPE = b.TRANS_TYPE_ID inner join (select * from VMS_CUSTOMER_INFO) c on t.CUSTOMER_ID = c.customer_id ) where 1 = 1 and t.DATASTATUS='1'

select * from ( select (@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) as rowindex, t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_TYPE as transType, t.CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, ifnull(b.TRANS_TYPE_NAME,'-') as transTypeName, t.CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT as customerAccount, t.TAX_FLAG as taxFlag, t.AMT_CNY as amt, t.TAX_RATE as taxRate, t.TAX_AMT_CNY as taxAmt, t.IS_REVERSE as isReverse, t.BANK_CODE as bankCode, t.REMARK as remark, t.ORG_CURR_CODE as orgCurrCode, t.ORG_ACC_NO as orgAccNo, t.AMT_CCY as amtCcy, t.REVERSE_TRANS_ID as reverseTransId, t.INCOME_CNY as income, t.SHORT_AND_OVER as shortAndOver, t.BALANCE as balance, t.INSTCODE as instCode, t.INSTNAME as instName, t.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, t.ORG_Trans_Type as orgTransType, t.ORG_Trans_SUB_Type as orgTransSubType, t.REVERSE_TRANS_DATE as reverseTransDate, t.TRANS_BUS_ID as transBusId, t.Trans_Curr as transCurr, t.TAX_AMT_CCY as taxAmtCcy, t.INCOME_CCY as incomeCcy, t.Surtax1_AMT_CNY as surtax1, t.Surtax2_AMT_CNY as surtax2, t.Surtax3_AMT_CNY as surtax3, t.Surtax4_AMT_CNY as surtax4, t.Trans_FaPiao_Flag as transFapiaoFlag, t.FaPiao_Date as fapiaoDate, t.FaPiao_Type as fapiaoType, t.Trans_Flag as transFlag, t.VAT_Rate_Code as vatRateCode, t.tax_cny_balance as taxCnyBalance, c.customer_cname as customerName, c.customer_taxno as customerTaxno, c.customer_address as customerAddress, c.customer_phone as customerTel, c.taxpayer_type as customerTaxPayerType, c.fapiao_type as customerFaPiaoType, c.customer_nationality as customerNationality
from (SELECT * FROM VMS_TRANS_INFO t where 1 = 1
t.Instcode in
#auth_inst_ids[]#
ORDER BY t.businessid )t left join VMS_TRANS_TYPE b on t.TRANS_TYPE = b.TRANS_TYPE_ID
inner join (select * from VMS_CUSTOMER_INFO c
) c on t.CUSTOMER_ID = c.customer_id where 1 = 1
order by transDate
sqlMap.insert: insert into VMS_TRANS_CUSTOMER_HIS values( VMS_TRANS_CUSTOMER_HIS_SEQ.nextval, #transId#, #orgCustomerId#, #currCustomerId#, #orgCustomerTaxNo#, #currCustomerTaxNo#, #orgCustomerName#, #currCustomerName#, date_format(SYSDATE(),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #operUser#, #conCustremark# )
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from vms_trans_info t where 1=1 and t.DATASTATUS='1'
t.REPNUM = #repnum#
t.FEETYP in ('$businessType$')
t.DSOURCE = #source#
t.DATASTATUS != #datastatus#

SELECT T.TRANS_ID as transId,T.TRANS_TYPE as transType,T.CHERNUM as cherNum,t.REPNUM as repNum,T.PREMTERM as premTerm,t.DATASTATUS as datastatus FROM VMS_TRANS_INFO T WHERE 1=1
($checkSameWhereSql$)
sqlMap.delete:
delete from VMS_TRANS_INFO t where 1=1
t.CHERNUM in ($chernum$)
t.REPNUM in ($repnum$)
t.FEETYP in ('$businessType$')
t.DSOURCE = #source#
t.DATASTATUS = #datastatus#

delete from VMS_TRANS_INFO t where 1=1
t.TRANS_ID = #transid#
t.TRANS_TYPE in #transtype#
